name: get_elevation
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool elevation_from_latitude_and_longitude.
Tool description: Find the elevation at a specified location.
API description: Gets the elevation for specified latitude and longitude using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

lat.description: Latitude of the location for which the elevation is required.

lng.description: Longitude of the location for which the elevation is required.
